1.title: Wotties of Steel
1.plot: On the farm DottyWot is fascinated by a column of ants. SpottyWot is completely unimpressed - until he finds out how strong ants are, that is.

2.title: Nibble Notty
2.plot: While enjoying their loopy-fruity breakfast drinks inside the ship, something dire happens to SpottyWot's pictures which he left outside. SpottyWot and DottyWot investigate and go in search of the culprit.

3.title: Wot Plants
3.plot: After witnessing the farmer planting carrot seeds and learning what seeds are for, SpottyWot plants himself to see if he'll grow some mini SpottyWots.

4.title: Wot's New Pussycat
4.plot: One morning The WotWots find their favourite things have been nibbled during the night. SpottyWot goes off in search of the farm cat to see if it can help them with their little problem.

5.title: The Trotty Wot
5.plot: SpottyWot draws a picture of what he imagines a pony might look like. DottyWot finds a pony in the farm stable and really wants a pony ride - will she find a way to have one?

6.title: Swan Lake
6.plot: The WotWots are sailing paper boats on a pond when all of a sudden SpottyWot's boat sinks. He thinks he spots the culprit - a sea monster. But what sort of creature is it?

7.title: Wheelie Wots
7.plot: SpottyWot decides their spaceship needs new wheels so he goes in search of different kinds around the farm. He finds a set of interesting wheels, but will the spaceship like them?

8.title: Wormy Tale
8.plot: The WotWots spot an unusual creature through the Sneak-a-Peek periscope. SpottyWot is convinced it's a tail that has fallen off another animal. In fact, maybe it's a WotWot tail?.

9.title: Milky Moo
9.plot: SpottyWot and DottyWot can't decide what to mix for their loopy-fruity breakfast drinks. Through the Sneak-a-Peek periscope they see a cow being milked. Maybe milk would make for a good ingredient for their breakfast?

10.title: Alpaca Sad
10.plot: Feeling creative at the farm, the WotWots draw an imaginary animal with poodle legs, a camel's body and a sheep's head. The WotWots are very surprised to find the creature may actually exist.

11.title: Whistle Wots
11.plot: The WotWots find a sheep dog hard at work. SpottyWot is inspired, but is he inspired enough to herd up the huge mess he made earlier?

12.title: Tough Crowd
12.plot: DottyWot is having a great day on the farm impersonating animals. Then she meets a scarecrow that doesn't seem to find her jokes funny. Will the WotWots be able to make the scarecrow laugh?

13.title: Sleepless in the Cattle
13.plot: The WotWots can't sleep. The farm animals are very noisy and keep them awake at night. SpottyWot asks them to be quiet, but they don't listen. Maybe it's time to leave the farm?

14.title: Fronds Like These
14.plot: The WotWots land on a sandy beach and DottyWot explores a rock pool. She finds a sea anemone and the WotWots learn all about these amazing creatures on their computer.

15.title: Moons and Moats
15.plot: SpottyWot builds a massive sand castle on the beach, but that night the tide washes it away. The WotWots build a new castle and decide to protect it from the sea.

16.title: Crabby WotWot
16.plot: To SpottyWot's horror the spaceship has run out of bananas for his loopy-fruity drink. The WotWots go on a hunt for what they think is a giant banana, but it turns out to be something very different.

17.title: Footprints in the Sand
17.plot: The WotWots find some mysterious foot prints in the sand. What could have made them and where do they lead.?The WotWots decide to track down the mystery footprint maker.

18.title: Wot a Racket
18.plot: The WotWots discover a large shell which sounds like there is an ocean inside it. SpottyWot doesn't want to take the shell inside the ship in case the sea floods out.

19.title: Gnome Sweet Gnome
19.plot: DottyWot and SpottyWot are looking at some mythical creatures on the Spaceship's computer. They think these creatures are real and go out in search of them at the beach.

20.title: Wind Wotty
20.plot: The WotWots see a kite flying at the beach. They are fascinated and want to find out what else can move with the wind. Can the WotWots use the wind as well?

21.title: Twinkle Winkle
21.plot: The WotWots find a Starfish washed up on the beach. They decide to send it home, but first they have to find out where the Starfish came from, was it the sea or the starry sky?

22.title: WotWot Bottle Wot
22.plot: SpottyWot makes a monster out of sand and driftwood. While looking for shells to decorate it he finds a message in a bottle. The WotWots decide to make their own message.

23.title: Wot a Grommet
23.plot: SpottyWot is enthralled when he spies a surfer riding the waves. He wants to try it himself - until he sees how big the waves can be. But DottyWot hatches a plan to help him.

24.title: Wot a Hermit
24.plot: DottyWot makes a picture out of shells on the beach but before she can show her brother the picture has moved. Is it possible that the shells are moving themselves?

25.title: Shiver Me Wotties
25.plot: SpottyWot draws a treasure map and goes out onto the beach to dig for the treasure. He's not having much luck until DottyWot points him to the right spot. What will he find?

26.title: Gulls Gulls Gulls
26.plot: The WotWots spot some seagulls diving into the sea for fish. SpottyWot is excited by the idea of being underwater and the WotWots prepare their Spaceship to go into the sea.

1.title: Scary Sucky Nose
1.plot: The WotWots hear a strange trumpeting sound and go to investigate. SpottyWot sees a large elephant trunk and decides it must be a long floppy ear.

2.title: Fruity Loopies
2.plot: DottyWot is making delicious loopy fruities for breakfast and SpottyWot decides his long drinking straw is just like the long straight neck of a giraffe.

3.title: Lanky Landing Legs
3.plot: SpottyWot is fixing the long lanky legs of the spaceship when his sister spots two other long legs through the Sneak-a-peek, two long and very pink lanky legs.

4.title: Spot a DottyWot
4.plot: The WotWots are playing hide and seek, and when SpottyWot uses the Sneak-a-peek to look for his sister he spots an amazing new animal.

5.title: Stripe a LottyWotty
5.plot: The WotWots spot a very stripy animal and head off to investigate. SpottyWot decides he would like stripes as well, and comes up with a clever plan to get them.

6.title: Plodda Lotty
6.plot: SpottyWot is in a mood to zoom and he's frustrated that his sister is moving too slowly. But he's very impressed when they spot a creature that does everything slowly.

7.title: Drowsy DottyWot
7.plot: It's midday and the zoo animals are snoozing in the warm sunshine even the WotWots are sleepy. But a new adventure soon has them awake.

8.title: Top and Tail
8.plot: SpottyWot is left hanging from the ship's rail when his chair runs out of fuel. And he discovers he's not the only resident of the zoo who can swing from his hands.

9.title: Fluffy Puppies
9.plot: DottyWot watches some amazing cloud shapes drifting by. She head out into the zoo with her brother to look for any animals as fluffy and white as the clouds.

10.title: Coughy Wot
10.plot: SpottyWot's chair has a cold and is sneezing. It's hard for SpottyWot to ride but he manages to stay on as the WotWots go on an adventure to cheer up the chair.

11.title: Stretch and Grow
11.plot: SpottyWot doesn't like doing stretches like his sister. But when he learns it can make him tall and straight he finds an animal that can show him how to really stretch.

12.title: Sneaky Squawky
12.plot: SpottyWot is upset when his brightest shiny crayons go missing. His sister tracks them down for him, but getting them back again might not be the right thing to do.

13.title: Twisty Sticks
13.plot: SpottyWot is distressed when one of his antennae goes straight and spiky. So DottyWot finds an animal that is proud to be covered in lots of straight, pointy spikes.

14.title: Skip-a-Lotty Wotty
14.plot: SpottyWot likes to skip and bounce and is delighted to discover he's not the only one - the zoo is full of creatures that love to jump and bounce like him.

15.title: Bubbly Wots
15.plot: The WotWots are surprised to hiccup some bubbles when they finish their loopy fruity drinks. They're even more surprised to find others are blowing bubbles too.

16.title: Egg Sighting
16.plot: The WotWots learn about warning signs around the zoo. They make a sign for their egg shaped ship to warn off any giant hens that might come to sit on it.

17.title: HicHoppity Wot
17.plot: DottyWot helps her brother who has got a case of the hiccups. Out in the zoo they investigate a croaking animal that seems to be suffering the same complaint.

18.title: Creepalongy Wot
18.plot: SpottyWot can't seem to sneak up on his sister so he investigates the camouflage techniques of animal. But how do you hide when you're blue with pink spots?

19.title: Blinky Winky
19.plot: SpottyWot is no match for his sister in a staring contest. But out in the zoo they come across a creature who can out stare even the amazing staring DottyWot.

20.title: Topsy Turvy Wotty
20.plot: SpottyWot finds a safe spot to do some upside down stunt flying in his chair and DottyWot finds a resident of the zoo who likes to sleep hanging upside down.

21.title: Go the Greens
21.plot: DottyWot's brother won't eat the delicious broccoli soup she's made. To show it's good for him she sets out to find a big animal who loves to eat greens.

22.title: Tickle Toes
22.plot: SpottyWot has an itch on his toes that he can't quite reach, but a kind sister can. And together they find a clever animal that can use its toes just like fingers.

23.title: Hot Wots
23.plot: It's a frosty morning and the WotWots need some hot chocolate to get warm. Outside they discover how the animals cope with the cold without the aid of hot drinks.

24.title: Copy Copy Wotty
24.plot: The WotWots think they hear a new WotWot calling their name. They set of to find the stranger but discover it's not another alien, but something just as colourful.

25.title: Wet Wots
25.plot: SpottyWot is very excited to find a picture of a dinosaur and is determined to find one. He sets off round the zoo to see if he can discover a living, breathing dinosaur.

26.title: Slurpylurpy Lips
26.plot: DottyWot wants to nap in the sun, not play catch ball with her brother. SpottyWot has to play ball on his own and is delighted when a zoo animal decides to join in.

27.title: Spring Wotty
27.plot: DottyWot is disappointed to lose a jumping competition. She goes around the zoo looking for a bouncing animal that can help her jumping technique.

28.title: Socket Sprocket Pocket
28.plot: DottyWot's chair needs fixing but her brother keeps losing his spanner. One of the zoo's cutest residents shows how to keep important things close by them.

29.title: Sir Spotty Wot
29.plot: DottyWot reads a book about knights and dragons. SpottyWot decides he will be a knight and he sets off on a quest to find his very own dragon in the zoo.

30.title: Floppy Flufties
30.plot: The WotWots are playing a guessing game with their fluffy antenna, will they be up or will they be down? They decide to find an animal who might like to join in.

31.title: Peek-A-Beak
31.plot: The WotWots play at drawing pictures in the dark. It's very hard to do and they are surprised to learn there are animals that can see well in the dark.

32.title: The Digger They Are
32.plot: SpottyWot thinks a big digger that's laying drains at the zoo is a large hungry animal. When he's told it's not an animal he's disappointed - until he finds another digger.

33.title: Laugh a Lotty
33.plot: The WotWots are pulling funny faces and laughing when someone else starts laughing with them. They set out to find who is laughing from the treetops.

34.title: Double Bumpies
34.plot: SpottyWot is convinced he's discovered an animal with two heads. DottyWot is surprised and delighted and they set off through the zoo to try and find it.

35.title: Ready to Roar
35.plot: SpottyWot's attempt to scare his sister with a loud roar isn't very scary. So the WotWots head out to find an animal with a terrifying roar that SpottyWot can copy.

36.title: Fill Bill
36.plot: DottyWot spots a duck bill on the zoo pond. When the whole animal is revealed the WotWots are surprised to find the bill doesn't really belong to a duck after all.

37.title: Stingy Thingy
37.plot: The WotWots are out smelling flowers when SpottyWot starts to play with a bee. He learns that some creatures have a painful way of telling you they don't want to play.

38.title: Looky Looky
38.plot: SpottyWot spots a creature with hundreds of eyes and hurries to tell his sister. DottyWot is very surprised and they set out to find the mythical multi eyed monster.

39.title: Wot a Ploppy
39.plot: SpottyWot is learning to track animals by recognizing their droppings. He sets out to track down the animal that has made an impressively big pile of droppings.

40.title: Prickly Prints
40.plot: The WotWots spot some interesting footprints and track down who made them. SpottyWot decides he can make some interesting paw prints of his own.

41.title: True Blue
41.plot: Blue is the best colour in the galaxy as far as SpottyWot is concerned. He looks for a local animal that is clothed in this same glorious colour as himself.

42.title: Beat-Boppy Wots
42.plot: The WotWots love to dance but their new routine is missing something. So they head off into the zoo to learn some new moves from a few of the animals.

43.title: Picture Puzzle
43.plot: While his sister sleeps, SpottyWot prepares a great game for her to play. Out in the zoo he pins a series of clues up that lead her on an adventure.

44.title: Colour Cunundrums
44.plot: Eureka. SpottyWot discovers how to change colours and turns blue and red to purple. He discovers an animal that can change the colour of its whole body.

45.title: Lumpy Bumpies
45.plot: SpottyWot is making a crayon rubbing from the lumpy bark of a tree when DottyWot spots something else that's lumpy and bumpy through the Sneak-a-peek.

46.title: Over the Rainbow
46.plot: How sunlight is refracted to create a rainbow doesn't matter to the WotWots, they just know the sky is smiling with a beautiful upside down rainbow smile.

47.title: Trail Tail
47.plot: The WotWots find a mysterious trail of slime. SpottyWot thinks it the lick of an animal with a giant tongue. So they try to find it by following the slippery slime trail.

48.title: Ready to Rumble
48.plot: The WotWots discover dingoes in the zoo. When SpottyWot learns that dingoes make cosy dens to sleep in he decides to build a cosy den of his own.

49.title: Wotter Otter
49.plot: SpottyWot designs a remote control system for his chair. It turns out to be what they need to rescue SpottyWot's spanner from an animal enclosure.

50.title: Tufty Tops
50.plot: The WotWots are very proud of their fluffy antennae head wear. They go in search of the brightest horn, hair and crest that zoo animals have to offer.

51.title: Speedy Spots
51.plot: In a quest for speed SpottyWot adjusts his chair motor. Then he sees the fastest animal and decides the key to speed lies in the colour of your spots.

52.title: Ready or Notty
52.plot: The WotWots find that lots of animals have bright red fur or feathers. Some have bright red markings, some are browny red and some are a soft pinky red like DottyWot.

imdb.title: The Wotwots
plot: A mix of live-action and computer animation to follow a pair of inquisitive, creative alien siblings as they learn about life on Earth.::zzzorf
